mapper.select:
select common_cd , ctgr from common_code where common_cd like #{code}||'%'
and length(common_cd) = 4
and length(common_cd) = 6
select ctgr ,common_cd from common_code where ctgr like '%'||#{value}||'%' and length(common_cd) =6
select common_cd , h_cd from common_code where ctgr =( select h_ctgr from common_code where ctgr = #{value} )

select t.item_no, c.sc, c.theme, t.nm, NVL(DECODE(t.prc,0,i.cl_prc,t.prc),0) tprc, NVL(DECODE(t.prc,0,0,t.prc - i.cl_prc),0) change , trunc(NVL(DECODE(t.prc,0,0,t.prc - i.cl_prc) / i.cl_prc, 0)*100) rate from (select item_no, cl_prc from item_info where to_char(ta_dt,'yyyy-MM-dd') =( select to_char(max(ta_dt),'yyyy-MM-dd') from item_info ) ) i -- 전날 주가정보 left join ( select distinct(a.item_no) item_no,nm,'tah-'||a.tano ta_no,NVL(ta_prc,0) prc from( SELECT nm,i.item_no, MAX(to_number(substr(ta_no,5))) tano FROM (select * from ta_hr where to_char(ta_dt,'yyyy-MM-dd') =( select to_char(max(ta_dt),'yyyy-MM-dd') from ta_hr ) ) t right join item i on i.item_no = t.item_no GROUP BY nm,i.item_no order by to_number(substr(item_no,5)) ) a left join ta_hr t on a.item_no= t.item_no and to_number(substr(t.ta_no,5)) = a.tano order by to_number(substr(item_no,5)) ) t -- 최근체결가 on i.item_no = t.item_no join ( select case substr(common_cd,1,2) when 'S1' then '농산물' when 'S2' then '수산물' end sc ,h_ctgr theme , ctgr item ,common_cd from common_code where length(common_cd) =6 order by common_cd ) c on c.item=t.nm order by common_cd
select count(*) from item

select rownum ,nm , a.item_no ,inq , change , rate from ( select i.nm, i.item_no item_no , f.inq+i.inq inq from item i join ( select item_no, sum(inq) inq from item_info where ta_dt > sysdate-7 group by item_no order by inq desc ) f on i.item_no = f.item_no ) a join ( select i.item_no, i.cl_prc, NVL(DECODE(t.prc,0,i.cl_prc,t.prc),0) tprc, NVL(DECODE(t.prc,0,0,t.prc - i.cl_prc),0) change , trunc(NVL(DECODE(t.prc,0,0,t.prc - i.cl_prc) / DECODE(i.cl_prc, 0, NULL, i.cl_prc), 0)*100) rate from (select item_no, cl_prc from item_info where to_char(ta_dt,'yyyy-MM-dd') = ( select to_char(max(ta_dt),'yyyy-MM-dd') from item_info ) ) i -- 전날 주가정보 join ( select distinct(a.item_no) item_no,nm,'tah-'||a.tano ta_no,NVL(ta_prc,0) prc from( SELECT nm,i.item_no, MAX(to_number(substr(ta_no,5))) tano FROM (select * from ta_hr where to_char(ta_dt,'yyyy-MM-dd') =( select to_char(max(ta_dt),'yyyy-MM-dd') from ta_hr ) ) t right join item i on i.item_no = t.item_no GROUP BY nm,i.item_no order by to_number(substr(item_no,5)) ) a left join ta_hr t on a.item_no= t.item_no and to_number(substr(t.ta_no,5)) = a.tano order by to_number(substr(item_no,5)) ) t -- 최근 체결가 on i.item_no = t.item_no ) b on a.item_no = b.item_no where rownum <6 order by inq desc

select t.item_no, t.nm,DECODE(t.prc,0,i.cl_prc,t.prc) tprc, DECODE(t.prc,0,0,t.prc - i.cl_prc) change ,trunc(NVL(DECODE(t.prc,0,0,t.prc - i.cl_prc) / DECODE(i.cl_prc, 0, NULL, i.cl_prc), 0)*100) rate from (select b.item_no, cl_prc from item_info a join (select i.item_no ,t.nm from interest_item i join item t on i.item_no = t.item_no where memb_no = 'mem-1') b on a.item_no = b.item_no where to_char(ta_dt,'yyyy-MM-dd') = ( select to_char(max(ta_dt),'yyyy-MM-dd') from item_info ) ) i --전일주가정보 join ( select distinct(a.item_no) item_no,nm,'tah-'||a.tano ta_no,NVL(ta_prc,0) prc from( SELECT nm,i.item_no, MAX(to_number(substr(ta_no,5))) tano FROM (select * from ta_hr where to_char(ta_dt,'yyyy-MM-dd') =( select to_char(max(ta_dt),'yyyy-MM-dd') from ta_hr ) ) t right join item i on i.item_no = t.item_no GROUP BY nm,i.item_no order by to_number(substr(item_no,5)) ) a left join ta_hr t on a.item_no= t.item_no and to_number(substr(t.ta_no,5)) = a.tano order by to_number(substr(item_no,5)) ) t -- 최근 체결가 on i.item_no = t.item_no

mapper.select: select rownum , board_no , ttl , case common_cd when 'C201' then '농산물' when 'C202' then '수산물' end cntn from ( select board_no,ttl,common_cd from board where common_cd = ( select common_cd from common_code where ctgr =( select case substr(c.common_cd,1,2) when 'S1' then '농산물' when 'S2' then '수산물' end sc from common_code c join item i on c.common_cd = i.common_cd where item_no = #{itemNo}) and common_cd like 'C%' ) order by drwup_dt desc) a where rownum <= 10

select rownum , a.* from(select i.item_no, i.nm, NVL(sum(stock_cnt),0) vol from item i left join( select * from ta_hr where to_char(ta_dt,'yyyy-MM-dd') = to_char(sysdate , 'yyyy-MM-dd') ) t on t.item_no = i.item_no group by i.item_no,i.nm order by 3 desc ) a where rownum <= 5

select rownum, f.* from ( select t.item_no, t.nm,trunc(NVL(DECODE(t.prc,0,0,t.prc - i.cl_prc) / DECODE(i.cl_prc, 0, NULL, i.cl_prc), 0)*100) rate from (select item_no, cl_prc from item_info where to_char(ta_dt,'yyyy-MM-dd') = ( select to_char(max(ta_dt),'yyyy-MM-dd') from item_info ) ) i --전일주가정보 join ( select distinct(a.item_no) item_no,nm,'tah-'||a.tano ta_no,NVL(ta_prc,0) prc from( SELECT nm,i.item_no, MAX(to_number(substr(ta_no,5))) tano FROM (select * from ta_hr where to_char(ta_dt,'yyyy-MM-dd') =( select to_char(max(ta_dt),'yyyy-MM-dd') from ta_hr ) ) t right join item i on i.item_no = t.item_no GROUP BY nm,i.item_no order by to_number(substr(item_no,5)) ) a left join ta_hr t on a.item_no= t.item_no and to_number(substr(t.ta_no,5)) = a.tano order by to_number(substr(item_no,5)) ) t -- 최근 체결가 on i.item_no = t.item_no
order by rate desc
order by rate
) f
where rownum <= 5

select rownum , a.* from( select prc , sum(rmn_cnt) cnt
from sell_order
from buy_order
where item_no = #{itemNo} group by prc ) a
where rownum <=5 and cnt <> 0
order by prc
desc

select t.item_no, t.nm,DECODE(t.prc,0,i.cl_prc,t.prc) tprc, DECODE(t.prc,0,0,t.prc - i.cl_prc) change ,trunc(NVL(DECODE(t.prc,0,0,t.prc - i.cl_prc) / DECODE(i.cl_prc, 0, NULL, i.cl_prc), 0)*100) rate from (select item_no, cl_prc from item_info where to_char(ta_dt,'yyyy-MM-dd') =( select to_char(max(ta_dt),'yyyy-MM-dd') from item_info ) ) i --item_info 전날 주가정보 join ( select b.item_no , b.nm,NVL(prc,0) prc,origin,desct from( select distinct(a.item_no) item_no ,a.nm,'tah-'||a.tano ta_no, ta_prc prc from( SELECT nm,i.item_no, MAX(to_number(substr(ta_no,5))) tano FROM (select * from ta_hr where to_char(ta_dt,'yyyy-MM-dd') =( select to_char(max(ta_dt),'yyyy-MM-dd') from ta_hr ) ) t right join item i on i.item_no = t.item_no where i.item_no = #{itemNo} GROUP BY nm,i.item_no order by to_number(substr(item_no,5)) ) a left join ta_hr t on a.item_no= t.item_no and to_number(substr(t.ta_no,5)) = a.tano order by to_number(substr(item_no,5)) ) b left join item i on b.item_no=i.item_no ) t --오늘날짜 중 가장최근 거래가 (=현재가) on i.item_no = t.item_no

select p.item_no,DECODE(prc,0,i.cl_prc,prc) prc,sum(stock_cnt) cnt ,point,m.memb_no, trunc((DECODE(prc,0,i.cl_prc,prc) - trunc(avg(trade_prc)))/trunc(avg(trade_prc))*100) rate from poss_stock p join ( select distinct(a.item_no) item_no ,a.nm,'tah-'||a.tano ta_no, nvl(ta_prc,0) prc from( SELECT nm,i.item_no, MAX(to_number(substr(ta_no,5))) tano FROM (select * from ta_hr where to_char(ta_dt,'yyyy-MM-dd') =( select to_char(max(ta_dt),'yyyy-MM-dd') from ta_hr ) ) t right join item i on i.item_no = t.item_no where i.item_no = 'ite-15' GROUP BY nm,i.item_no order by to_number(substr(item_no,5)) ) a left join ta_hr t on a.item_no= t.item_no and to_number(substr(t.ta_no,5)) = a.tano order by to_number(substr(item_no,5)) ) a -- 최근체결가 on p.item_no = a.item_no join member m on m.memb_no = p.memb_no join (select item_no, cl_prc from item_info where to_char(ta_dt,'yyyy-MM-dd') =( select to_char(max(ta_dt),'yyyy-MM-dd') from item_info ) ) i on i.item_no = p.item_no where p.memb_no ='mem-2' group by p.item_no,prc,point,m.memb_no,i.cl_prc

select b.item_no , NVL(vol,0) vol ,NVL(op_prc,0) op_prc, NVL(prc,0) cl_prc , NVL(l_prc,0) l_prc , NVL(h_prc,0) h_prc , NVL(inq,0) inq from ( select item_no,'tah-'||MAX(to_number(substr(ta_no,5))) ta_no, sum(stock_cnt) vol ,min(ta_prc) l_prc,max(ta_prc) h_prc from ta_hr where to_char(ta_dt,'yyyy-MM-dd') = to_char(sysdate , 'yyyy-MM-dd') group by item_no order by to_number(substr(item_no,5)) ) a -- 오늘 거래량 고가, 저가 join ( select distinct(a.item_no) item_no,ta_prc prc from( SELECT nm,i.item_no, MAX(to_number(substr(ta_no,5))) tano FROM ta_hr t right join item i on i.item_no = t.item_no where to_char(ta_dt,'yyyy-MM-dd') = ( select to_char(max(ta_dt),'yyyy-MM-dd') from ta_hr ) GROUP BY nm,i.item_no order by to_number(substr(item_no,5)) ) a left join ta_hr t on a.item_no= t.item_no and to_number(substr(t.ta_no,5)) = a.tano order by to_number(substr(item_no,5)) ) b -- 오늘 마지막 거래가 on b.item_no = a.item_no left join ( select z.item_no, cl_prc op_prc ,x.inq from item_info z join item x on z.item_no = x.item_no where to_char(ta_dt,'yyyy-MM-dd') = to_char(sysdate-1,'yyyy-MM-dd') ) c -- 전날 종가 (=현재 시가) 와 조회수 on b.item_no = c.item_no order by to_number(substr(item_no,5))
mapper.insert: insert into item_info ( INFO_NO ,ITEM_NO , TA_DT , VOL , OP_PRC , CL_PRC , L_PRC , H_PRC , INQ ) values ( 'inf-'||item_info_seq.nextval, #{itemNo}, sysdate, NVL(#{vol},0), NVL(#{opPrc},0), NVL(#{clPrc},0), NVL(#{lPrc},0), NVL(#{hPrc},0), #{inq} )
mapper.select: select ta_dt , vol, op_prc , cl_prc , l_prc , h_prc from item_info where to_char(ta_dt,'yyyy-MM-dd') between ( select to_char(min(ta_dt),'yyyy-MM-dd') from item_info ) and to_char(sysdate , 'yyyy-MM-dd') and item_no = #{itemNo} order by ta_dt

select ta_dt ,sum(vol) vol, trunc(avg(op_prc)) op_prc , trunc(avg(cl_prc)) cl_prc, trunc(avg(l_prc)) l_prc , trunc(avg(h_prc )) h_prc from( select
trunc(ta_dt, 'day') ta_dt,
trunc(ta_dt,'MM') ta_dt,
trunc(ta_dt,'y') ta_dt,
vol, op_prc , cl_prc , l_prc , h_prc from item_info where to_char(ta_dt,'yyyy-MM-dd') between ( select to_char(min(ta_dt),'yyyy-MM-dd') from item_info ) and to_char(sysdate , 'yyyy-MM-dd') and item_no = #{itemNo} ) a group by ta_dt order by ta_dt
mapper.insert: insert into alarm ( ALARM_NO, MEMB_NO, CNTN, ALARM_DT, CHECKED, A_TYPE) values ('alm-'||alarm_seq.nextval , #{membNo}, #{cntn}, sysdate, 'n', 'stock' )
